trans-unit.source: Represents a node that can contain other nodes.
trans-unit.target: 表示可包含其他节点的节点。

trans-unit.source: This class provides functionality such as finding the next or previous sibling node, or enumerating the direct children of a node.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供功能，如查找一个或下一个同级节点，或枚举节点的直接子级。

trans-unit.source: The two classes that derive from <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer> are <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument> and <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>.
trans-unit.target: 两个类派生自<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer>是<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument>和<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified content as children to this <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的内容作为子级添加到此 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer" />。

trans-unit.source: This method adds the new content after the existing content of the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的现有内容的后面添加新的内容<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer>。

trans-unit.source: For details about the valid content that can be passed to this function, see [Valid Content of XElement and XDocument Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae).
trans-unit.target: 有关可以传递给此函数的有效内容的详细信息，请参阅[有效的内容的 XElement 和 XDocument 对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae)。

trans-unit.source: This method will raise the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject.Changed> and the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject.Changing> events.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将引发<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject.Changed>和<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject.Changing>事件。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates two XML trees, and then uses this method to add the results of a query to one of them.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建两个 XML 树，然后使用此方法将查询的结果添加到其中之一。

trans-unit.source: This example produces the following output:
trans-unit.target: 该示例产生下面的输出：

trans-unit.source: A content object containing simple content or a collection of content objects to be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的包含简单内容的内容对象或内容对象集合。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified content as children of this <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的内容添加为此 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer" /> 的子级。

trans-unit.source: This method adds the new content after the existing content of the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的现有内容的后面添加新的内容<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer>。

trans-unit.target: 此方法将引发<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject.Changed>和<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject.Changing>事件。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates two XML trees, and then uses this method to add an <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement> object to one of them.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建两个 XML 树，然后使用此方法来添加<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>到其中的对象。

trans-unit.source: It also adds the results of a [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] query to the XML tree.
trans-unit.target: 它还添加的结果[!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)]到 XML 树的查询。

trans-unit.source: This example produces the following output:
trans-unit.target: 该示例产生下面的输出：

trans-unit.source: A parameter list of content objects.
trans-unit.target: 内容对象的参数列表。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified content as children of this <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的内容添加为此 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer" /> 的子级。

trans-unit.target: 下面的示例将创建两个 XML 树，使用此方法将添加<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>到其中的对象。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified content as the first children of this document or element.
trans-unit.target: 将指定内容作为此文档或元素的第一个子级添加。

trans-unit.source: This method adds the new content before the existing content of the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer>.

trans-unit.target: 要添加的包含简单内容的内容对象或内容对象集合。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified content as the first children of this document or element.
trans-unit.target: 将指定内容作为此文档或元素的第一个子级添加。

trans-unit.source: This method adds the new content before the existing content of the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将添加新内容的现有内容的前面<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer>。

trans-unit.target: 此方法将引发<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject.Changed>和<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject.Changing>事件。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates two XML trees, uses this method to add an <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement> object as the first element to one of them.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例将创建两个 XML 树，使用此方法将添加<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>对象作为第一个元素到其中一个。

trans-unit.source: This example produces the following output:
trans-unit.target: 该示例产生下面的输出：

trans-unit.source: A parameter list of content objects.
trans-unit.target: 内容对象的参数列表。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified content as the first children of this document or element.
trans-unit.target: 将指定内容作为此文档或元素的第一个子级添加。

trans-unit.source: This method adds the new content before the existing content of the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将添加新内容的现有内容的前面<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer>。

trans-unit.source: For details about the valid content that can be passed to this function, see [Valid Content of XElement and XDocument Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae).

trans-unit.source: This method will raise the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject.Changed> and the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject.Changing> events.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将引发<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject.Changed>和<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject.Changing>事件。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates two XML trees, and uses this method to add an <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement> object as the first element to one of them.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建两个 XML 树，并使用此方法来添加<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>对象作为第一个元素到其中一个。

trans-unit.source: It also adds the results of a [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] query to the XML tree.
trans-unit.target: 它还添加的结果[!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)]到 XML 树的查询。

trans-unit.source: This example produces the following output:
trans-unit.target: 该示例产生下面的输出：

trans-unit.source: The parent is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 父级为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> that can be used to add nodes to the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建可用于将节点添加至 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> that is ready to have content written to it.
trans-unit.target: 已准备好写入内容的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: While serializing, namespace prefixes are inferred from the namespace attributes in the XML tree.
trans-unit.target: 序列化时，从 XML 树中的命名空间属性推断出命名空间前缀。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Working with XML Namespaces](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理 XML 命名空间](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430)。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to perform an XSLT transformation.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可用于执行 XSLT 转换。

trans-unit.source: You can create an XML tree, create an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> from the XML tree, create a new document, and create a <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> that will write into the new document.
trans-unit.target: 你可以创建 XML 树，创建<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>从 XML 树中，创建一个新文档，并创建<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>，以写入新文档。

trans-unit.source: Then, you can invoke the XSLT transformation, passing the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> and <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> to the transform.
trans-unit.target: 然后，可以调用 XSLT 转换，传入<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>和<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>的转换。

trans-unit.source: After the transformation successfully completes, the new XML tree is populated with the results of the transformation.
trans-unit.target: 在转换成功完成后，使用转换的结果，填充新的 XML 树。

trans-unit.source: This example produces the following output:
trans-unit.target: 该示例产生下面的输出：

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of the descendant nodes for this document or element, in document order.
trans-unit.target: 按文档顺序返回此文档或元素的子代节点集合。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> of <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XNode" /> containing the descendant nodes of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer" />, in document order.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XNode" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />，其中按文档顺序包含 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer" /> 的子代节点。

trans-unit.source: Note that attributes are not considered to be nodes in [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)], so they will not be part of the collection that is returned by this method.
trans-unit.target: 请注意属性不视为要中的节点[!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)]，因此它们不会通过此方法返回的集合的一部分。

trans-unit.source: This method uses deferred execution.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用延迟执行。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an XML tree, and then iterates through the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer.DescendantNodes%2A> axis.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建一个 XML 树，，然后遍历<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer.DescendantNodes%2A>轴。

trans-unit.source: This example produces the following output:
trans-unit.target: 该示例产生下面的输出：

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of the descendant elements for this document or element, in document order.
trans-unit.target: 按文档顺序返回此文档或元素的子代元素集合。

trans-unit.source: This method uses deferred execution.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用延迟执行。

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of the descendant elements for this document or element, in document order.
trans-unit.target: 按文档顺序返回此文档或元素的子代元素集合。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> of <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" /> containing the descendant elements of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />，其中包含 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer" /> 的子代元素。

trans-unit.source: Note that this method will not return itself in the resulting <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此方法将不返回本身在产生<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement.DescendantsAndSelf%2A> if you need to include the current <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement> in the results.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement.DescendantsAndSelf%2A>如果你需要包括当前<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>在结果中。

trans-unit.source: This method uses deferred execution.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用延迟执行。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an XML tree, and then uses this axis method to retrieve the descendants.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建一个 XML 树，，，然后使用此轴方法检索子代。

trans-unit.source: This example produces the following output:
trans-unit.target: 该示例产生下面的输出：

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XName" /> to match.
trans-unit.target: 要匹配的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XName" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a filtered collection of the descendant elements for this document or element, in document order.
trans-unit.target: 按文档顺序返回此文档或元素的已筛选的子代元素集合。

trans-unit.source: Only elements that have a matching <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XName" /> are included in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中仅包括具有匹配 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XName" /> 的元素。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> of <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" /> containing the descendant elements of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer" /> that match the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XName" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />，其中包含与指定 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XName" /> 相匹配的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer" /> 的子代元素。

trans-unit.source: This method uses deferred execution.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用延迟执行。

trans-unit.source: The following example prints all descendants of an element.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例将打印元素的所有后代。

trans-unit.source: This example produces the following output:
trans-unit.target: 该示例产生下面的输出：

trans-unit.source: The following is the same example, but in this case the XML is in a namespace.
trans-unit.target: 下面是相同的示例中，但在这种情况下 XML 命名空间中。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Working with XML Namespaces](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理 XML 命名空间](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430)。

trans-unit.source: This example produces the following output:
trans-unit.target: 该示例产生下面的输出：

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XName" /> to match.
trans-unit.target: 要匹配的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XName" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the first (in document order) child element with the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XName" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取具有指定的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XName" /> 的第一个（按文档顺序）子元素。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" /> that matches the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XName" />, or <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 与指定的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XName" /> 相匹配的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" />，或者为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns `null` if there is no element with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 返回`null`如果没有具有指定名称的元素。

trans-unit.source: Some axis methods return collections of elements or attributes.
trans-unit.target: 一些轴方法返回元素或属性的集合。

trans-unit.source: This method returns only a single element.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回仅包含单个元素。

trans-unit.source: This method returns `null` if the element with the specified name is not found.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回`null`如果找不到具有指定名称的元素。

trans-unit.source: All of the methods that allow you to construct elements (the constructor of <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>, <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer.Add%2A>, and so on) accept `null` as a valid argument.
trans-unit.target: 所有方法，可用于构造元素 (的构造函数<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>， <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer.Add%2A>，依次类推) 接受`null`作为有效参数。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to use a convenient idiom: you can call this method as part of functional construction, and the element is added to the XML tree being constructed if and only if the element exists in the source tree.
trans-unit.target: 此选项，可以使用一种方便的方法： 你可以作为一部分函数构造，调用此方法，该元素添加到正在构造当且仅当源树中存在该元素的 XML 树。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows this idiom.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示此习惯用法。

trans-unit.source: In contrast to <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer.Elements%2A>, this method is not an axis method.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer.Elements%2A>，此方法不是的轴方法。

trans-unit.source: It does not use deferred execution; it simply returns an element when called.
trans-unit.target: 它不使用延迟的执行;它只是返回的元素时调用。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows two uses of this method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示此方法的两种用法。

trans-unit.source: In one case, the method finds the element in `srcTree`.
trans-unit.target: 在一种方案，此方法找到中的元素`srcTree`。

trans-unit.source: In the second case, the method does not find the element in the source tree, no element is added to `xmlTree`, and no exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 在第二个用例，该方法不查找元素，在源树中，不将元素添加到`xmlTree`，并不会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Note that the Visual Basic example uses the child XML property.
trans-unit.target: 请注意 Visual Basic 示例中使用的子级 XML 属性。

trans-unit.source: It is also allowable to use the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer.Element%2A> method directly in Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 它也是允许使用<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer.Element%2A>直接在 Visual Basic 中的方法。

trans-unit.source: This example produces the following output:
trans-unit.target: 该示例产生下面的输出：

trans-unit.source: The following is the same example, but in this case the XML is in a namespace.
trans-unit.target: 下面是相同的示例中，但在这种情况下 XML 命名空间中。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Working with XML Namespaces](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理 XML 命名空间](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430)。

trans-unit.source: This example produces the following output:
trans-unit.target: 该示例产生下面的输出：

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of the child elements of this element or document, in document order.
trans-unit.target: 按文档顺序返回此元素或文档的子元素集合。

trans-unit.source: This method uses deferred execution.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用延迟执行。

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of the child elements of this element or document, in document order.
trans-unit.target: 按文档顺序返回此元素或文档的子元素集合。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> of <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" /> containing the child elements of this <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer" />, in document order.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />，其中按文档顺序包含此 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer" /> 的子元素。

trans-unit.source: This method uses deferred execution.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用延迟执行。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an XML tree, and then selects some elements using this axis method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例将创建 XML 树，然后选择使用此轴方法的某些元素。

trans-unit.source: This example produces the following output:
trans-unit.target: 该示例产生下面的输出：

trans-unit.source: The following is the same example, but in this case the XML is in a namespace.
trans-unit.target: 下面是相同的示例中，但在这种情况下 XML 命名空间中。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Working with XML Namespaces](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理 XML 命名空间](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430)。

trans-unit.source: This example produces the following output:
trans-unit.target: 该示例产生下面的输出：

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XName" /> to match.
trans-unit.target: 要匹配的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XName" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a filtered collection of the child elements of this element or document, in document order.
trans-unit.target: 按文档顺序返回此元素或文档的已筛选的子元素集合。

trans-unit.source: Only elements that have a matching <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XName" /> are included in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中仅包括具有匹配 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XName" /> 的元素。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> of <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" /> containing the children of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer" /> that have a matching <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XName" />, in document order.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />，其中按文档顺序包含具有匹配 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XName" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer" /> 的子级。

trans-unit.source: This method uses deferred execution.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用延迟执行。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an XML tree, and then selects several child elements using this axis method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例将创建 XML 树，然后选择几个使用此轴方法的子元素。

trans-unit.source: This example produces the following output:
trans-unit.target: 该示例产生下面的输出：

trans-unit.source: The following is the same example, but in this case the XML is in a namespace.
trans-unit.target: 下面是相同的示例中，但在这种情况下 XML 命名空间中。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Working with XML Namespaces](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理 XML 命名空间](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e3003209-3234-45be-a832-47feb7927430)。

trans-unit.source: This example produces the following output:
trans-unit.target: 该示例产生下面的输出：

trans-unit.source: Get the first child node of this node.
trans-unit.target: 获取此节点的第一个子节点。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XNode" /> containing the first child node of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XNode" />，其中包含 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer" /> 的第一个子节点。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an element that contains child elements.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建一个包含子元素的元素。

trans-unit.source: It then gets the first child node of the parent element.
trans-unit.target: 然后获取父元素的第一个子节点。

trans-unit.source: This example produces the following output:
trans-unit.target: 该示例产生下面的输出：

trans-unit.source: Get the last child node of this node.
trans-unit.target: 获取此节点的最后一个子节点。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XNode" /> containing the last child node of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XNode" />，其中包含 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer" /> 的最后一个子节点。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an element that contains child elements.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建一个包含子元素的元素。

trans-unit.source: It then gets the last child node of the parent element.
trans-unit.target: 然后获取父元素的最后一个子节点。

trans-unit.source: This example produces the following output:
trans-unit.target: 该示例产生下面的输出：

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of the child nodes of this element or document, in document order.
trans-unit.target: 按文档顺序返回此元素或文档的子节点集合。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> of <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XNode" /> containing the contents of this <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer" />, in document order.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XNode" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />，其中按文档顺序包含此 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer" /> 的内容。

trans-unit.source: Note that the content does not include attributes.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，该内容不包括特性。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)], attributes are not considered to be nodes of the tree.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)]，特性不被视为是树的节点。

trans-unit.source: They are name/value pairs associated with an element.
trans-unit.target: 它们是与元素关联的名称/值对。

trans-unit.source: This method uses deferred execution.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用延迟执行。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an XML tree with a variety of types of nodes.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例与各种类型的节点创建 XML 树。

trans-unit.source: It then queries this axis method to enumerate and print the nodes.
trans-unit.target: 然后查询此轴方法，以枚举并打印节点。

trans-unit.source: This example produces the following output:
trans-unit.target: 该示例产生下面的输出：

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an XML tree that contains a variety of types of nodes.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建一个包含各种类型的节点的 XML 树。

trans-unit.source: It then enumerates through portions of the tree, printing the node types.
trans-unit.target: 它然后枚举通过树中，打印的节点类型的部分。

trans-unit.source: This example produces the following output:
trans-unit.target: 该示例产生下面的输出：

trans-unit.source: Removes the child nodes from this document or element.
trans-unit.target: 从此文档或元素中移除子节点。

trans-unit.source: If you call this method on an element that contains attributes, this method will not remove the attributes.
trans-unit.target: 如果在包含属性的元素上调用此方法，此方法不会删除属性。

trans-unit.source: To remove the attributes of an element, use <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement.RemoveAttributes%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要删除元素的属性，使用<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement.RemoveAttributes%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Linq.Extensions.Remove%2A> method has related functionality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Linq.Extensions.Remove%2A>方法有相关的功能。

trans-unit.source: It removes the child nodes of every node in a collection.
trans-unit.target: 它移除集合中的每个节点的子节点。

trans-unit.source: This method will raise the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject.Changed> and the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject.Changing> events.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将引发<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject.Changed>和<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject.Changing>事件。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an XML tree that contains some child nodes.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建一个包含某些子节点的 XML 树。

trans-unit.source: It then calls this method to remove the child nodes.
trans-unit.target: 它然后调用此方法以删除的子节点。

trans-unit.source: This example produces the following output:
trans-unit.target: 该示例产生下面的输出：

trans-unit.source: Replaces the children nodes of this document or element with the specified content.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定内容替换此文档或元素的子节点。

trans-unit.source: For details about the valid content that can be passed to this function, see [Valid Content of XElement and XDocument Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae).
trans-unit.target: 有关可以传递给此函数的有效内容的详细信息，请参阅[有效的内容的 XElement 和 XDocument 对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae)。

trans-unit.source: This method will raise the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject.Changed> and the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject.Changing> events.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将引发<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject.Changed>和<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject.Changing>事件。

trans-unit.source: This method has snapshot semantics.
trans-unit.target: 此方法有快照语义。

trans-unit.source: It first creates a copy of the new content.
trans-unit.target: 它首先创建新的内容的副本。

trans-unit.source: It then removes all children nodes of this node.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它会删除此节点的所有子节点。

trans-unit.source: Finally, it adds the new content as children nodes.
trans-unit.target: 最后，它将新的内容添加为子节点。

trans-unit.source: This means that you can replace children nodes using a query on the children nodes themselves.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着，你可以替换在自己的子节点上使用查询的子节点。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates two XML trees, and then uses this method to replace the contents of one of them with the results of a query.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建两个 XML 树，，，然后使用此方法将其中之一的内容替换为查询的结果。

trans-unit.source: This example produces the following output:
trans-unit.target: 该示例产生下面的输出：

trans-unit.source: A content object containing simple content or a collection of content objects that replace the children nodes.
trans-unit.target: 用于替换子节点的包含简单内容的内容对象或内容对象集合。

trans-unit.source: Replaces the children nodes of this document or element with the specified content.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定内容替换此文档或元素的子节点。

trans-unit.source: For details about the valid content that can be passed to this function, see [Valid Content of XElement and XDocument Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae).
trans-unit.target: 有关可以传递给此函数的有效内容的详细信息，请参阅[有效的内容的 XElement 和 XDocument 对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae)。

trans-unit.source: This method will raise the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject.Changed> and the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject.Changing> events.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将引发<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject.Changed>和<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject.Changing>事件。

trans-unit.source: This method has snapshot semantics.
trans-unit.target: 此方法有快照语义。

trans-unit.source: It first creates a copy of the new content.
trans-unit.target: 它首先创建新的内容的副本。

trans-unit.source: It then removes all children nodes of this node.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它会删除此节点的所有子节点。

trans-unit.source: Finally, it adds the new content as children nodes.
trans-unit.target: 最后，它将新的内容添加为子节点。

trans-unit.source: This means that you can replace children nodes using a query on the children nodes themselves.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着，你可以替换在自己的子节点上使用查询的子节点。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an XML tree that contains children nodes.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建一个包含子节点的 XML 树。

trans-unit.source: It then replaces all of the children nodes with a single element.
trans-unit.target: 它然后将替换所有子节点具有单个元素。

trans-unit.source: To see an example of replacing the children nodes with the results of a [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] query, see <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer.ReplaceNodes%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要查看的子节点替换的结果示例[!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)]查询，请参阅<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer.ReplaceNodes%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This example produces the following output:
trans-unit.target: 该示例产生下面的输出：

trans-unit.source: A parameter list of content objects.
trans-unit.target: 内容对象的参数列表。

trans-unit.source: Replaces the children nodes of this document or element with the specified content.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定内容替换此文档或元素的子节点。

trans-unit.source: For details about the valid content that can be passed to this function, see [Valid Content of XElement and XDocument Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae).
trans-unit.target: 有关可以传递给此函数的有效内容的详细信息，请参阅[有效的内容的 XElement 和 XDocument 对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae)。

trans-unit.source: This method will raise the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject.Changed> and the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject.Changing> events.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将引发<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject.Changed>和<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XObject.Changing>事件。

trans-unit.source: This method has snapshot semantics.
trans-unit.target: 此方法有快照语义。

trans-unit.source: It first creates a copy of the new content.
trans-unit.target: 它首先创建新的内容的副本。

trans-unit.source: It then removes all children nodes of this node.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它会删除此节点的所有子节点。

trans-unit.source: Finally, it adds the new content as children nodes.
trans-unit.target: 最后，它将新的内容添加为子节点。

trans-unit.source: This means that you can replace children nodes using a query on the children nodes themselves.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着，你可以替换在自己的子节点上使用查询的子节点。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a dictionary and an XML tree.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建一个字典和 XML 树。

trans-unit.source: It then queries the dictionary, projects the results to an <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> of <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>, and replaces the contents of the XML tree with the results of the query.
trans-unit.target: 然后它查询字典，将结果投影到<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>的<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>，并将 XML 树的内容替换查询的结果。

trans-unit.source: This example produces the following output:
trans-unit.target: 该示例产生下面的输出：
